ðŸ”¹ FULL RECIPE: https://www.veganricha.com/2016/05/lentil-brown-rice-soup.html

Easy 1 pot Lentil Rice Soup with Veggies, Spinach or greens of choice. 20 minutes Active time then let everything simmer. Make it in a saucepan or Instant Pot. Serve with crackers, papadum or grilled vegan cheese sandwiches. Vegan Gluten-free Soy-free Recipe. 

Soak the lentils and rice. Roast up the whole spices, cook onion, ginger and garlic, add in the ground spices, some tomatoes, some veggies, then add in the drained lentils and rice, water, salt and simmer until ready. I used carrots, peppers and some of the broccoflower that was sitting in the fridge. The broccoflower or  Romanesco broccoli has an interesting flavor profile. Use any veggies of choice. Fold in some spinach or baby greens towards the end. Use mung beans or black eyed peas for variation.

recipeIngredient: 1/2 tsp mustard seeds (optional or use 1/2 tsp ground mustard later)
1/2 tsp garam masala or curry powder (or use other spice blends like taco spice, berbere, cajun etc)
2 cups of veggies (I used bell pepper, carrots, broccoflower(Romanesco broccoli))
3.5 cups water for pressure cooker (4 to 4.5 cups for saucepan)
lemon juice (garam masala and cayenne for garnish)

recipeInstructions.text: Wash and Soak the lentil and rice if you haven't yet. (Soak for atleast 15 minutes before using).
recipeInstructions.name: Wash and Soak the lentil and rice if you haven't yet. (Soak for atleast 15 minutes before using).

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a saucepan or a pressure cooker over medium heat. When hot, add cumin seeds, mustard seeds and cook until fragrant or they change color.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat oil in a saucepan or a pressure cooker over medium heat. When hot, add cumin seeds, mustard seeds and cook until fragrant or they change color.

recipeInstructions.text: Add bay leaf, onion, garlic ginger, chile and cook until translucent. about 5 mins. Add the spices and mix in. Roast for half a minute
recipeInstructions.name: Add bay leaf, onion, garlic ginger, chile and cook until translucent. about 5 mins. Add the spices and mix in. Roast for half a minute

recipeInstructions.text: Add the tomatoes and splash of water and cook until the tomatoes are saucy. mash the larger pieces. Add lemon juice, ketchup, veggies, salt and mix in.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the tomatoes and splash of water and cook until the tomatoes are saucy. mash the larger pieces. Add lemon juice, ketchup, veggies, salt and mix in.

recipeInstructions.text: Drain and add lentils, rice, water/broth and mix in.
recipeInstructions.name: Drain and add lentils, rice, water/broth and mix in.

recipeInstructions.text: Cover and cook for 40 minutes or longer until tender in the saucepan. If using pressure cooker, use 2 to 2.5 cups water, Pressure cook for 15-17 mins on stove top ( Manual 18-20 minutes in Instant Pot with natural release).
recipeInstructions.name: Cover and cook for 40 minutes or longer until tender in the saucepan. If using pressure cooker, use 2 to 2.5 cups water, Pressure cook for 15-17 mins on stove top ( Manual 18-20 minutes in Instant Pot with natural release).

recipeInstructions.text: Fold in the spinach in the last 5 minutes, Or when you open the pressure cooker and the soup is hot.
recipeInstructions.name: Fold in the spinach in the last 5 minutes, Or when you open the pressure cooker and the soup is hot.

recipeInstructions.text: Add a sprinkle garam masala, cayenne to taste and more lemon if needed. Serve with crackers or papaddum.
